name: Flubbermonkeys
description:
Cozy two player couch coop, best played with friends and family. 

Jump into an enchanted jungle with your friend as a wobbly Flubbermonkey! 
With your brains joint together, solve puzzles by using  each others stretchy and super wobbly Flubbermonkey moves! Objects located around the magic jungle can also be used in various ways to solve puzzles. Try your best to reach the jungles magical dong at the very end of the level by working together. Solve puzzles in various and creative ways!

(Try your best to reach the end of the adventure by working together, and by solving puzzles in various and creative ways.)

Join the discord ! 
https://discord.gg/pEKz7b2
